articles.description: Water frost has been detected at the equator of Mars for the first time, contrary to previous beliefs that such frost couldn't exist in this region of the Red Planet.
articles.content: The frost was found within the Tharsis region, home to the largest volcanic area on Mars, covering 12 large volcanoes, including Olympus Mons, the solar system's tallest peak.
